Photo / Police

Auckland teen’s heartbreak over pack-rape sentences, says system is ‘messed up’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-teens-heartbreak-over-pack-rape-sentences-says-system-is-messed-up/7RUIW3HFMRBJZIW24EXH4UCDAY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-teens-heartbreak-over-pack-rape-sentences-says-system-is-messed-up/7RUIW3HFMRBJZIW24EXH4UCDAY/ Tara ShaskeyThree men raped her. The court case was recently closed with the sentencing of two of the offenders involved, Teina Takimoana, centre, and Arthur Te Wera, right.
